advancements.divineartifacts.descr.divgo: it's can be found in a Woodland mansion treasure chest with a 2% chance
advancements.divineartifacts.descr.cryst: it's can be found in a End City treasure chest  with a 2% chance
advancements.divineartifacts.title: Finally!!
lore.div.divineartifacts.tooltip: This Divine Ring grants its bearer a lot of abilities,
lore2.div.divineartifacts.tooltip: like flying, high damage and health and fast movement
lore3.div.divineartifacts.tooltip: and much much more, it makes you a demigod,
lore4.div.divineartifacts.tooltip: giving you the upper hands no matter what.
lore2.magic.divineartifacts.tooltip: grants its bearer unmatched magical powers.
tooltip.divineartifacts.gold.lore: this ring was made of a high density material,
tooltip.divineartifacts.gold.lore2: used in the making of divine and out of this world artifacts.
tooltip.divineartifacts.crystal.lore: this is the main component of making any of the divine artifacts,
tooltip.divineartifacts.crystal.lore2: this crystal radiate with unfathomable and unlimited power.
lore.divineartifacts.knowledge: Forged in the crucible of enlightenment, the...
lore2.divineartifacts.knowledge:
Forged in the crucible of enlightenment, the
  Heart of Knowledge binds the wielder's journey
  into its illuminated shimmers.

  Each encounter inscribes the saga of their growth,
  transmuting experiences into potent mana.

  An artifact coveted by seekers of arcane
  mastery, its words whisper secrets
  of power untold.

lore.divineartifacts.attractor: Forged amidst the cosmic chaos, a dense celes...
lore2.divineartifacts.attractor:
Forged amidst the cosmic chaos,a dense celestial
  core pulsates with ancient magic.
  Bound by ethereal threads, it hungers for
  the treasures of realms, drawing them close
  with an irresistible pull, weaving destiny's
  tapestry with each acquisition.
